translation.title: Sargassum stranding live map, webcams and beach reporting
translation.description: Explore worldwide beach statuses since 2018. Get daily, weekly and monthly sargassum stranding trends. Watch live beach webcams. Report your beach status.
translation.Welcome: sargassum.watch allows you to monitor the evolution of sargassum stranding around the world
translation.Zoom on the map to reveal clean beaches: Zoom on the map to reveal clean beaches
translation.Click on the eyes to watch live beach we: Click on the eyes to watch live beach webcams
translation.Report the presence of sargasses at your: Report the presence of sargasses at your position with the blue button
translation.na help: Moderate to critical stranding, the source does not specify.
translation.Please get closer to the beach: Please get closer to the beach
translation.about us: sargassum.watch is a community-driven project to monitor sargassum stranding waves around the world.
translation.about sargassum: Originating off the coast of Brazil, these toxic seaweeds have been stranded on the Caribbean Sea since 2011. A phenomenon that has significant ecological and economical consequences.
translation.about data: The data presented here come from our users as well as from third party sites. When the data does not come directly from a user of the site, the source is indicated on the relevant point on the map.
We're now aware of your issue and we'll take action quickly, thank you for your patience.
